titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending the contributions of Li Ka-shing in global business leadership and philanthropy upon his retirement from a 78-year professional career.
A resolution recognizing and commending the contributions of Li Ka-shing in global business leadership and philanthropy upon his retirement from a 78-year professional career.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Commends Li Ka-shing for his global business leadership and service to humanity through the advancement of philanthropy, and congratulates him upon his retirement as chairman of the CK Group of Companies.
